sentence: The image is an infographic detailing the experiences of people who purchased a home with ZipRealty in 2008.
sentence_cn: 该图是一张信息图，详细介绍了 2008 年通过 ZipRealty 购买房屋的人们的经历。

sentence: It is divided into two sections:
- Title: "Of the people who purchased a home with ZipRealty in 2008..."
sentence_cn: - 标题：“2008 年通过 ZipRealty 购买房屋的人……”
words: Of the people who purchased a home with ZipRealty in 2008...

sentence: - Text underneath reads: "Nearly all ¡®08 buyers still own the home they bought with ZipRealty."
sentence_cn: - 下面的文字为：“几乎所有 08 年买家仍然拥有他们通过 ZipRealty 购买的房屋。”
words: Nearly all ¡®08 buyers still own the home they bought with ZipRealty.

sentence: - Text underneath reads: "Most ¡®08 home buyers thought of their new home as a mid to long-term investment, with 60% planning to live there for over seven years."
sentence_cn: - 下面文字为：“大多数 08 年购房者将新房视为中长期投资，其中 60% 的人计划在那里居住七年以上。”
words: Most ¡®08 home buyers thought of their new home as a mid to long-term investment, with 60% planning to live there for over seven years.

sentence: - A horizontal line with alternating stars in red, white, and blue.
sentence_cn: - 一条水平线，上面交替出现红、白、蓝三色星星。

sentence: - Text underneath reads: "So, even though 73% believe their house has decreased in value..."
sentence_cn: - 下面的文字是：“因此，尽管 73% 的人认为他们的房子价值已经贬值……”
words: So, even though 73% believe their house has decreased in value...

sentence: - Text underneath reads: "The majority of ¡®08 home buyers feel neutral to significantly better off than they did four years ago."
sentence_cn: - 下面文字为：“大多数 08 年购房者感觉他们的经济状况与四年前相比有所改善。”
words: The majority of ¡®08 home buyers feel neutral to significantly better off than they did four years ago.

sentence: - "The majority feel they are better off today."
sentence_cn: - “大多数人觉得他们现在的生活过得更好。”
words: The majority feel they are better off today.

sentence: The overall theme suggests that despite fluctuations in home value, most homebuyers from 2008 feel better or neutral about their situation.
sentence_cn: 总体主题表明，尽管房屋价值有所波动，但 2008 年的大多数购房者对自己的状况感觉更好或持中立态度。
